location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 236 x 288mm, on sheet 294 x 340mm

mods.abstract: The map shows a stretch of the Shatt al Arab River in the vicinity of Fao, indicating hydrology and the locations of buoys, lights and prominent buildings, with short notes on navigation.The map was made 'from a tracing by C.C. Johnson, Lieut. (N.) H.M.S. Highflyer.', and bears the printing statements, 'S[imla] D[rawing] O[ffice] Topo. Dy. No. 89. Exd. C.J.A., July 1911.', 'No. 5,253. 1911.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
